content: मंद्र {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [मंद्-रक् <ls>Uṇ. 2. 13</ls>] {@--1@} Low, deep, grave, hollow, rumbling (as sound); पयोदमंद्रध्वनिना धरित्री <ls>Ki. 16. 3</ls>; <ls n="Ki.">7. 22</ls>; <ls>Me. 99</ls>; <ls>R. 6. 56.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Delightful, pleasing, pleasant. {@--3@} Praiseworthy. --द्रः {@--1@} A deep sound, low tone. {@--2@} A kind of drum. {@--3@} A kind of elephant.
